Action.body: sam, the issue is that from cloud to cloud, the wait time will be very different. The cloud-init can take a long time. I think that the best way will be adding a parameter as a wait time in the cloud configuraiton file so that you can adjust that value according to your need. It will be nice to have a patch set on this.
